H.R. 1130/S. 397, Fair Medicare Hospital Payments Act of 2017
H.R. 1892, Bipartisan Budget Act of 2018 - provisions related to Medicare hospital payments and policy and funding to address opioid abuse. Monitored discussions related to potential reductions to Medicare payments.

Opposed H.R. 4710, a bill to implement reporting requirement for certain 340B participants and to establish a 2-year moratorium on new 340B program participants
